text: Jay Shah (born September 22, 1988) is the Chairman of the International Cricket Council (ICC) and formerly the Secretary of Board of Cricket Control in India (BCCI) and the President of Asian cricket council (ACC). He is the son of Amit Shah, an Indian politician who is the Home Ministry of India and the former President of the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP). == References == Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Indian people Category:Sports executives and administrators
title: Jay Shah
